purpose: Ciprobay HC OTIC is used for ear infection. A type of antibacterial substance that is used for swollen ear dur to infection.
usage: The patient must lie down with the infected ear facing towards the sky. After shaking the bottle with the lid on, drop 2 ~ 3 of the medicine in the infected ear using the pipet included.
sideEffects: Itchiness in the Ear is common. Although unusual, pain, blockage, discomfort, redness of ear canal may be a possible side effect.
storage: Do not store above 25째C: Do not store in a refrigerator or freezer. Protect from light.
avoidReasons: Patients who are hypersensitive (allergic) to hydrocortisone, ciprofloxacin or similar medicines (ask your doctor or pharmacist) must not use Ciprobay HC.
details: The antibiotic in Ciprobay HC is not effective against all microorganisms that cause infections. Using the wrong antibiotic or the wrong dose of antibiotic can cause complications. Therefore, never use this medicine to treat other conditions or other people.
